## âš™ï¸ Setting Up Development Environment

```bash
git clone https://github.com/abdulsamet/logmancer.git
cd logmancer
python -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate  # or venv\Scripts\activate on Windows
pip install -e ".[dev]"
